meanings.definition: A slang term for a person's face.
meanings.sent1: She had a big smile on her muts.
meanings.sent2: His muts showed excitement when he saw the surprise.
meanings.sent3: The clown painted a funny face on his muts.
meanings.sent4: Her muts lit up with joy like a bright sun.
meanings.sent5: The muts in the mirror reflected happiness back at her.

meanings.definition: To make a face expressing displeasure or contempt.
meanings.sent1: He muts whenever he doesn't get his way.
meanings.sent2: She muts at the thought of eating broccoli.
meanings.sent3: The toddler loves to muts to get attention from his parents.
meanings.sent4: His muts could freeze water with its intensity.
meanings.sent5: The muts he made was so exaggerated, it made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: A type of head covering worn for warmth.
meanings.sent1: She wore a cozy muts during the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: His muts kept his ears warm in the chilly wind.
meanings.sent3: The muts flew off her head in the strong gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: The muts was like a hug for her head in the cold.
meanings.sent5: The colorful muts stood out in the sea of black winter hats.
